def summarize_scope(part, book, chapter, section):
    return f"{part}.{book}.{chapter}.{section}"

summary = summarize_scope(2, 1, 2, 1)
print(f"Scope identifier: {summary}")

### Definition 2.1.2.1.2 {#definition-2-1-2-1-2}

> **Definition (Scope identifier).** A scope identifier is the four-part label that maps a topic to its part, book, chapter, and section.
